choices: Your friend purchases the voodoo doll
The voodoo doll looks just like you
The voodoo doll looks just like a friend
1.content:
The day was fairly uneventful for a lazy Saturday. After spending some time hanging out with friends, a few of you decided to head to the local outlets, where a strange new shop had just opened.

The sign above it had some cartoonish magic elements, a crystal ball and a wand. Honestly, it seemed a bit cheesy at first glance, but your friends insisted on going inside.

You followed them in, rolling your eyes at all the cliche items lining the aisles. Childish beginner magic sets, paraphernalia, etc.

Nothing really stood out, until you saw a strange doll sitting on one of the shelves. It appeared to be staring right at you, completely lifeless.

You made your way over to it and...
1.title: The Voodoo Doll

14.content:
At first the doll had looked pretty plain and boring, but as you moved closer you started to make out some distinct features.

It wasn't long before the doll began to seem familiar. It's features shifted and changed before your eyes. At first you thought it was just a trick of the light, but soon you realized that it seemed to be transforming.

By time you got up next to it, the changes had completed. You let out a grasp, the doll looked just like...
14.title: The voodoo doll looks just like a friend

info.brief_description: One day you come to find out that voodoo dolls are very real.
info.description:
One day you stumble upon the fact that magic and voodoo are real. Now, what will you do with that knowledge?

- Please proofread your entries
- Please keep entries longer than a couple sentences.
- Please make option choices meaningful
